title: Default value in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value that is set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5. [Missing continuation of SR statement]
OB: The default value that is set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR: New a report parameter, set Display type to List Box. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', set 'aa' as the default value and click OK. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. [Missing continuation of SR statement]
